body: Can we #blameSaiki for this? Also, the author do the law lmao
Killer Queen has already touched those panties

Common doesn't mean good. Hoq exatly does poor character design not take  away the enjoyment?

Monster musume is a shitty harem, not a "regular manga" of course it's going to have bad character design. Everything's gona be bad in it. It's a harem.

Well, if you think about it, the males missing details on their face is very common in hentai. It's never been necessary unless they really wanted to detail the MC. It doesn't take away from the enjoyment or story. Look at Monster Musume, a regular manga where the author purposely gives the MC low details for his face. That's your opinion if you don't like it. Guess you just wanted it to be heard
What a nice read. The beginning was hilarious. Finally a really nice Yuko doujinshi
Wow I learned a lot about japanese consent laws

Self insert. That's just cheap. I mean I know the game is 1st person perspective, but this hentai isn't.
I know that about idolmaster, I just don't like faceless characters in hentai . It's just lazy design.

What I meant by anime version producers is that for the 3 TV anime, there was 1 dedicated producer to produce the main cast. Aside from the 2011 anime where Ritsuko (one of the idols) produces her own team of idols for the same office. You have to read about that on your own though. But if you already know Idolmaster, you would already know what I'm talking about

The guy doesn't have eyes because the Producer is supposed to be you. Idolmaster is a game where you produce the idol. 
Sure there are the anime version producers and even some artists come up with their own interpretations, but in the game,  it's you

Meh. Funny, but why doesn't the guy have eyes?
Also this is the third hentai by Aoki Kanji uploaded today. This is a good day.
